title: Survey on regretting tattoos in the U.S. 2015
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 2 number of Responses.
The maximum Share of respondents 77.0 is found at Response No and the minimum is found at Yes where Response is 23.0.
Response Yes has 3.35 times less Share of respondents than Response No which is the highest.
min_summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
Response No has the highest Share of respondents and Yes has the lowest Share of respondents.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 2 number of Responses.
The maximum Share of respondents 77.0 is found at Response No and the minimum is found at Yes where Response is 23.0.
Response Yes has 3.35 times less Share of respondents than Response No which is the highest.
max_summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
Response No has the highest Share of respondents and Yes has the lowest Share of respondents.
There is a difference of 54.0 between the maximum Response No and minimum Response Yes.
Considered together, the average Share of respondents in all 2 Responses is roughly 50.0.
Summing up the values of all Responses, we get total 100.0.
